summary: This is an email from July 18, 2021, discussing the discovery of two additional FedEx shipping records. The email notes specific pages within PDF attachments where a package to an individual (name redacted) is documented and mentions the involvement of the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.

persons.name: Maurene Comey
persons.context: She is listed as the recipient of the correspondence at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York, indicating her role in the legal proceedings.

events.title: Discovery of Additional FedEx Records
events.description: An email is sent reporting the discovery of two additional FedEx shipping records, with specific references to pages in attached PDFs documenting a package sent to a redacted individual.

locations: One St. Andrew's Plaza, New York, New York 10007
keyFacts: Two additional FedEx shipping records were discovered and referenced in PDF attachments.
A package was sent to a redacted individual, with the specific documentation found on page 5 of one PDF and page 8 of another.
The correspondence is addressed to Assistant U.S. Attorney Maurene Comey at the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
The document is an email dated July 18, 2021, indicating ongoing investigative activity at that time.
